=Table project_userlogin=
==Remarks==
Users which have put a project into his favorite projects appeared here.

==Schema==
|| *Name* || *Type* || *Not Null* || *Primary Key* || *Foreign Key* || *Remarks * ||
|| project_databaseid || integer || X || X || [project](databaseid) || This is a foreign key to the table project. ||
|| favoriteusers_userid || integer || X || X || [userlogin](userid) || This is a foreign key to the table userlogin. ||
